    policy_id="daily-snapshots",
    name="<daily-snapshot-{now/d}>",
    schedule="0 45 23 * * ?",
    repository="my_repository",
    config={
        "indices": "*",
        "include_global_state": True
    },
    retention={
        "expire_after": "30d",
        "min_count": 1,
        "max_count": 31
    },
)
print(resp)
